plot: During WWII, two young Jewish sisters help lead the 'underground railroad' in Nazi Germany. While being hunted down by Gestapo, they discover there is a mole within their group.
title: Rhine Maidens
plot_es: During WWII, two young Jewish sisters help lead the 'underground railroad' in Nazi Germany. While being hunted down by Gestapo, they discover there is a mole within their group.
plot_en: During WWII, two young Jewish sisters help lead the 'underground railroad' in Nazi Germany. While being hunted down by Gestapo, they discover there is a mole within their group.
